des:
The TPorig Skill offers users a convenient way to control TPorig smart light bulb 

To connect your TPorig smart light to the Alexa Skill, first use the TPorig App to connect your devices to the internet. Then open the Alexa App to find the TPorig Skill, enter the Skill and click the "ENABLE" button. The authentication page will pop up. Enter the username and password of the TPorig App. On completion, click Discover on your device. Alternatively you can say "Discover" to Alexa. After discovering the device, you will find the your TPorig smart light device name in Alexa App.

You can now control your TPorig smart light bulb (name smart light bulb) by speaking the following phrases to Alexa:
"Alexa, turn on the smart light bulb."
"Alexa, turn off the smart light bulb."
"Alexa, set the smart light bulb to red."
"Alexa, set the smart light bulb to blue."
"Alexa, set the smart light bulb to green."
"Alexa, set the smart light bulb to yellow."
"Alexa, set the smart light bulb to orange."
"Alexa, set the smart light bulb to violet."
"Alexa, set the smart light bulb to fifty percent."
"Alexa, make the smart light bulb warm white."
"Alexa, dim the smart light bulb."
"Alexa, brighten the smart light bulb."

You can check with your local reseller how to integrate the Alexa in you Home Manager system.
